title: 298: Emily Moynes (aka Blake’s Mom) Tells All & Gets Real!
itunes:title: 298: Emily Moynes (aka Blake’s Mom) Tells All & Gets Real!
description:
CW: domestic abuse) The Broads are joined by the amazing Emily Moynes aka Mama Moynes aka Blake’s mom - and to say she is a huge delight is an understatement! Bekah and Jess have the greatest time getting called out by Emily about past episodes (whoops), hearing about the BTS of Blake’s audition process and experience through both Bachelorette seasons, how Blake felt about the different Bachelorettes, what Emily thought was really going to happen with Blake and Katie, how she feels about the men from Clare/Tayshia and Katie’s season, and more! Then The Broads get to find out more about her - Emily shares about her history, gets vulnerable about her divorces, abuse, lovebombing, romanticizing relationships, where she is at now in her life, her book, her podcast and more - and let’s not forget chatting about her applying for The Bachelor and Aunt Lindsay. Thank you to Emily for joining the #broadsquad and being so willing to share her story. 

EMILY MOYNES:

***Purchase “Rising Up: Take Charge, Break the Cycle, and Rebuild a Kick-Ass Life” book here: https://rebuildakickasslife.com/book/

***Listen to “Get Real! with Mama Moynes” here: https://podcasts.apple.com/ca/podcast/get-real-with-mama-moynes/id1579105589

***Follow Emily here: https://www.instagram.com/emilymoynes/

***Find out more on her website here: https://rebuildakickasslife.com/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***RELIEFBAND: go to RELIEFBAND.COM and use code CHATTY to get 20% off + free shipping!

***THIRD LOVE: Go to THIRDLOVE.COM/CHATTY to get 20% off your first purchase! 

***MODERN FERTILITY: get $20 off the test when you go to MODERNFERTILITY.COM/CHATTY 

***CARE/OF: get 50% off your first Care/of order at TAKECAREOF.COM and enter code CHATTY50

***WORDTUNE: Try for FREE at wordtune.com/chatty or get a discount for your team today at WORDTUNE.COM/CHATTY 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
